Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Room creates a Room with a Point location, health, and booleans having left,right,topm, and bottom walls. A room also contains booleans for the presence or absence of a Monster,Player,Key,Door,Map,Food,Riddle,Books,ComboLock,Goat. it gives a integer 0-4 for door position inside a room (currently not used), a RoomGrid 2D char array to store a text based character representation or the room, and constants for the printing widith of a room, and the number of rows and columns in a room grid. This class is used in a 2D Room array in the class Maze.java.
    Since:
    July 20, 2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room()
      Default constructor sets the location to Point (0,0), all walls on, and no items, with door position at 0.
      Room(int x, int y, boolean left, boolean right, boolean top, boolean bottom)
      coordinate x, and y location and wall input constructor sets the location to Point local, and with input arguments for each wall.
      Room(Point locale, boolean left, boolean right, boolean top, boolean bottom)
      Point and wall input constructor sets the location to Point local, and with input arguments for each wall.
      Room(Room toCopy)
      Copy Constructor with Room input toCopy, deep copies all Room variables over to new instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room()
        Default constructor sets the location to Point (0,0), all walls on, and no items, with door position at 0. Additionally a new empty room grid is populated with characters representing the wall and item status.

      • Room

        public Room(Point locale,
            boolean left,
            boolean right,
            boolean top,
            boolean bottom)
        Point and wall input constructor sets the location to Point local, and with input arguments for each wall. Additionally a new empty room grid is populated with characters representing the wall and item status. All other itmes are defaulted to false, and door position to 0. RoomGrid is populated.
        Parameters:
        locale - a Point location for the room
        left - a boolean for the left wall, true if left wall is in place,
        right - a boolean for the right wall,
        top - a boolean for the top wall
        bottom - a boolean for the bottom wall

      • Room

        public Room(int x,
            int y,
            boolean left,
            boolean right,
            boolean top,
            boolean bottom)
        coordinate x, and y location and wall input constructor sets the location to Point local, and with input arguments for each wall. Additionally a new empty room grid is populated with characters representing the wall and item status. All other itmes are defaulted to false, and door position to 0. RoomGrid is populated.
        Parameters:
        x - an integer x-coordinate for the Room
        y - an integer y-coordinate for the Room
        left - a boolean for the left wall, true if left wall is in place,
        right - a boolean for the right wall,
        top - a boolean for the top wall
        bottom - a boolean for the bottom wall

      • Room

        public Room(Room toCopy)
        Copy Constructor with Room input toCopy, deep copies all Room variables over to new instance. Additionally the RoomGrid is re-populated after copy due to some bug.
        Parameters:
        toCopy - a Room variable to copy into the curent instance member wise. (Deep Copy).

      • getDoorPosition

        public int getDoorPosition()
        Accessor to get the status of the Door Position integer indicating the placement of the Door in the room. Will be used to plot the door in different spots inside of a room. Not currently used. Returns an integer 0-4 representing Door placement 0 in center, 1 left, 2 right, 3 top, 4 bottom.
        Returns:
        An integer 0-4 representing Door placement 0 in center, 1 left, 2 right, 3 top, 4 bottom.

      • getHasRiddle

        Returns:
        a boolean representing the state of whether the Riddle object is in the room or not.

      • drawRoom

        public void drawRoom()
        Deprecated. Replaced by drawRoomGrid()
        Deprecated Room Drawing Method, manually draws out a fixed width room. superceded by roomGrid 2D char array method.

      • populateRoomGrid

        public void populateRoomGrid()
        Mutator to populate the 2D char array RoomGrid, with character symbols representing the state of the Room booleans.

      • drawRoomGrid

        public void drawRoomGrid()
        Mutator to print out the 2D char array RoomGrid, with character symbols representing the state of the Room booleans. This method positions the room in its approximate Location in a 2D array of rooms at location corner = room.getLocation()

      • displayRoomStats

        public void displayRoomStats()
        Accessor method to print out the location and booleans present in a particualr room to the console in text mode.
